name: ScienceBlogs - Dark matter edition
description: Made for nightly research sessions on german ScienceBlogs site. Logo-animation by courtesy of Daniel Eden. So your dark brain matter won't be confused with overuse of these pesty little photons. Remember your black coffee!
additional_info:
